docs.snippet: Mr. Kluckhohn's dispatch from Montevideo to this newspaper reports the pressure being brought to bear on Uruguay by the Argentine Government because Uruguay has been steadfast in its devotion to democratic principles.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Kluckhohn's dispatch from Montevideo to this newspaper reports the pressure being brought to bear on Uruguay by the Argentine Government because Uruguay has been steadfast in its devotion to democratic principles.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 23--Argentina has made considerable progress in lining up a bloc in southern South America that is cooperating closely on political and economic matters and that has as one of its unwritten policies opposition to the United...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 23--Argentina has made considerable progress in lining up a bloc in southern South America that is cooperating closely on political and economic matters and that has as one of its unwritten policies opposition to the United States.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 26--Much more drastic action is necessary if the Government is to get wheat off the farm and on its way to the famine areas of the world, Dean Acheson, acting Secretary of State, asserted today.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 4--Argentine craftsmen are working to bring together again in some form the old vice-royalty of the River Plate under which, before San Martin and Bolivar, the Snaniards ruled as one administrative area Peru, Chile, Bolivia,...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, May 4--Argentine craftsmen are working to bring together again in some form the old vice-royalty of the River Plate under which, before San Martin and Bolivar, the Snaniards ruled as one administrative area Peru, Chile, Bolivia, Paraguay, Argentina and Uruguay.
